explanation: [0-0] An old man in a tattered red T-shirt is squatting in a jungle. He is sawing a piece of wood above his head with a saw.
[0-5] Subsequently, the old man begins to saw the wood. Wood chips fall into his eyes while sawing. Then, he stops sawing and rubs his eyes with his hands.
[0-5] Subsequently, the old man begins to saw the wood. Wood chips fall into his eyes while sawing. Then, he stops sawing and rubs his eyes with his hands.

[0-5] Subsequently, the old man begins to saw the wood. Wood chips fall into his eyes while sawing. Then, he stops sawing and rubs his eyes with his hands.

[5-15] Immediately afterwards, the old man takes out two white plastic spoons from his pocket and burns them with a lighter. Subsequently, he bends the two spoons, then burns the heads of the spoons, and glues the two spoons together to form a pair of glasses. The old man puts on the glasses he made, then gives a thumbs-up with both hands in front of his chest and smiles at the camera.
